name: fullstackopen_part3
description: Repository for the part 3 of the Full Stack Open curriculum

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/bcde-phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen_part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Lux Barker
